document.full_text: china needs to guard against volatility in u.s. treasury prices should investors demand higher returns from u.s. government debt, a researcher at the chinese central bank said on monday.
document.title: china must watch for rising u.s. treasury yields: researcher
lines_and_colors: china needs to guard against volatility in u.s. treasury prices should investors demand higher returns from u.s. government debt, a researcher at the chinese central bank said on monday.
